Name: Mathematic Adventures
About the game: Mathematic Adventures features a First Person Shooter educational game. There are enemies placed throughout the game in which the player must defeat. In order to progress through the game, the player must answer questions correctly. There are over 15 million possible randomly generated questions based on basic algebra. Students will strengthen their algebra from simple questions to more complex questions. When the player has completed the game, they may start again and keep practicing their mathematics since the questions are randomly generated to keep strengthening the players math skills.
